body:
I think a really good idea would be to let non-staff help with threads which break the rules.

So I thought maybe being able to report spammy threads could help the forums be under control even more (not that they aren't already). Then the staff could look at it and then it would be easier for them to lock threads.

Do you like this idea? Just a suggestion because sometimes there are so many duplicate threads (i especially get annoyed when someone copies my original post), i just want the thread to be locked!

It could be a sub-topic under REPORT THREADS.

The only problem would be people spamming it. But there are always spammers :(

replies.body:
1. You can take a screenshot for evidence and post in the report section if you think someone is breaking the rules in the forums.
2. There aren't too many posts in the forums per hour so catching rule breakers here is easy.
3. I'm going to talk to Ivy about this, maybe he is already doing it.
Thanks for the post!

It'll make things more organized. I really do not think this is necessary, though. One tab for reports would suffice.
